Detailed Description

Stop-watch for RStat.

This class is an helper to measure the delta between two time points. the tow timepoints are given bytthe date of creation and destruction of this class instance and addded on a RStat instance given as attribute.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Constructor.

Parameters:
output Output variable
who type of data to track

Starts the timer on who stats. The resulted will be added to output when this instance will be destroyed.
